title: Question:
author: Weebz
content: One of the most important skills you need to learn early in the Crypto space is "how to filter the noise".Get this and you're closer to your Breakthrough ‚ù§Ô∏èFirst thing you need is Focus:You must learn to follow one course until successful.Secondly, You need Right association:Right association is key in the crypto space if you truly wants to succeed. It's well said that who you follow determines what follows you. When you follow the wrong set of people, you will surely end up being distracted but when you follow the right people, you will surely end up a successful business man in the market place.More of this will be dropped here consequently. Do like and ¬†comment. Let's win together üòç

comments.author: Weebz
comments.body: Third key point you need to become successful in this space is" Limit your risk in any trade so that fear does not become the prevailing instinct guiding your judgment‚Äù

comments.author: Weebz
comments.body: Fourthly, you need to understand that crypto is wide and there are many opportunities for you all.Focus one field of endeavor in this space. If you are good at hunting for airdrops, stay there. If you are good at trading in Futures, Stay there. Don't be a jack of all trades. üòç

comments.author: Weebz
comments.body: Lastly, you need a right mentorship and proper knowledge.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Weebz on October 24, 2022, 03:43:29 PMIf you are good at hunting for airdrops, stay there.Hunting for airdrops shouldn't be a thing that has to be encouraged though. Airdrops where profitable in the past but no any more. Currently 99% are just scams and a waste of time. instead of wasting time looking meaningless airdrops.
